In England, in the seven days to 11 June, there were 40,925 new confirmed cases (72.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 June, there were 26,885 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 52% (14,040 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 June is 4,001,803 (7,109.6 cases per 100,000 population).
